message.createsantalucia.nether_portal_n: The structure is unstable... it fails.
The obsidian resists a common flame.
message.createsantalucia.obsidian_destro: The rock yields to your will.
message.createsantalucia.end_portal_acti: The stars align. The way is open.
message.createsantalucia.end_portal_no_e: The gateway craves a key... not an eye.
message.createsantalucia.no_obsidian_fou: No obsidian found in the area!
message.createsantalucia.end_portal_requ: You need the Master Key to activate this portal!
